Cvars.name: +autostrafe
Cvars.help: Auto-strafe button.

Cvars.name: +bhop
Cvars.help: Client sends a key-down event for the in_jump state.

Cvars.name: -autostrafe
Cvars.help: Auto-strafe button.

Cvars.name: -bhop
Cvars.help: Client sends a key-up event for the in_jump state.

Cvars.name: sar_about
Cvars.help: Prints info about SAR plugin.

Cvars.name: sar_aircontrol
Cvars.help: Enables more air-control on the server.

Cvars.name: sar_anti_anti_cheat
Cvars.help: Sets sv_cheats to 1.

Cvars.name: sar_autojump
Cvars.help: Enables automatic jumping on the server.

Cvars.name: sar_autorecord
Cvars.help: Enables automatic demo recording.

Cvars.name: sar_avg_result
Cvars.help: Prints result of average.

Cvars.name: sar_avg_start
Cvars.help: Starts calculating the average when using timer.

Cvars.name: sar_avg_stop
Cvars.help: Stops average calculation.

Cvars.name: sar_bind_reload
Cvars.help:
Automatic save-reload rebinding when server has loaded.
File indexing will be synced when recording demos.
Usage: sar_bind_reload <key> [save_name]

Cvars.name: sar_bind_save
Cvars.help:
Automatic save rebinding when server has loaded.
File indexing will be synced when recording demos.
Usage: sar_bind_save <key> [save_name]

Cvars.name: sar_cps_add
Cvars.help: Saves current time of timer.

Cvars.name: sar_cps_clear
Cvars.help: Resets saved times of timer.

Cvars.name: sar_cps_result
Cvars.help: Prints result of timer checkpoints.

Cvars.name: sar_cvarlist
Cvars.help: Lists all SAR cvars and unlocked engine cvars.

Cvars.name: sar_cvars_dump
Cvars.help: Dumps all cvars to a file.

Cvars.name: sar_cvars_dump_doc
Cvars.help: Dumps all SAR cvars to a file.

Cvars.name: sar_cvars_load
Cvars.help: Loads important SAR cvars.

Cvars.name: sar_cvars_lock
Cvars.help: Restores default flags of unlocked cvars.

Cvars.name: sar_cvars_save
Cvars.help: Saves important SAR cvars.

Cvars.name: sar_cvars_unlock
Cvars.help: Unlocks all special cvars.

Cvars.name: sar_debug_listener
Cvars.help: Prints event data of registered listener.

Cvars.name: sar_delete_alias_cmds
Cvars.help: Deletes all alias commands.

Cvars.name: sar_disable_challenge_stats_hud
Cvars.help: Disables opening the challenge mode stats HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_disable_no_focus_sleep
Cvars.help: Does not yield the CPU when game is not focused.

Cvars.name: sar_disable_steam_pause
Cvars.help: Prevents pauses from steam overlay.

Cvars.name: sar_duckjump
Cvars.help: Allows duck-jumping even when fully crouched, similar to prevent_crouch_jump.

Cvars.name: sar_dump_client_classes
Cvars.help: Dumps all client classes to a file.

Cvars.name: sar_dump_client_datamap
Cvars.help: Dumps client datmap to a file.

Cvars.name: sar_dump_events
Cvars.help: Dumps all registered game events of the game event manager.

Cvars.name: sar_dump_server_classes
Cvars.help: Dumps all server classes to a file.

Cvars.name: sar_dump_server_datamap
Cvars.help: Dumps server datamap to a file.

Cvars.name: sar_ei_hud
Cvars.help: Draws entity inspection data.

Cvars.name: sar_ei_hud_font_color
Cvars.help: RGBA font color of entity inspection HUD when not recording.

Cvars.name: sar_ei_hud_font_color2
Cvars.help: RGBA font color of entity inspection HUD when recording.

Cvars.name: sar_ei_hud_font_index
Cvars.help: Font index of entity inspection HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ei_hud_x
Cvars.help: X offset of entity inspection HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ei_hud_y
Cvars.help: Y offset of entity inspection HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ei_hud_z
Cvars.help: Z offset of entity inspection HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_exit
Cvars.help: Removes all function hooks, registered commands and unloads the module.

Cvars.name: sar_find_client_class
Cvars.help:
Finds specific client class tables and props with their offset.
Usage: sar_find_clientclass <class_name>

Cvars.name: sar_find_client_offset
Cvars.help:
Finds prop offset in specified client class.
Usage: sar_find_client_offset <class_name> <prop_name>

Cvars.name: sar_find_ent
Cvars.help:
Finds entity in the entity list by name.
Usage: sar_find_ent <m_iName>

Cvars.name: sar_find_ents
Cvars.help:
Finds entities in the entity list by class name.
Usage: sar_find_ents <m_iClassName>

Cvars.name: sar_find_server_class
Cvars.help:
Finds specific server class tables and props with their offset.
Usage: sar_find_serverclass <class_name>

Cvars.name: sar_find_server_offset
Cvars.help:
Finds prop offset in specified server class.
Usage: sar_find_server_offset <class_name> <prop_name>

Cvars.name: sar_force_fov
Cvars.help: Forces player FOV. Usage: sar_force_fov <fov>

Cvars.name: sar_hud_acceleration
Cvars.help: Draws instant acceleration.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_angles
Cvars.help:
Draws absolute view angles of the client.
0 = Default,
1 = XY,
2 = XYZ.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_avg
Cvars.help: Draws calculated average of timer.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_cps
Cvars.help: Draws latest checkpoint of timer.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_default_font_color
Cvars.help: RGBA font color of HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_default_font_index
Cvars.help: Font index of HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_default_padding_x
Cvars.help: X padding of HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_default_padding_y
Cvars.help: Y padding of HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_default_spacing
Cvars.help: Spacing between elements of HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_demo
Cvars.help: Draws name, tick and time of current demo.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_frame
Cvars.help: Draws current frame count.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_inspection
Cvars.help: Draws entity inspection data.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_jump
Cvars.help: Draws current jump distance.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_jump_peak
Cvars.help: Draws longest jump distance.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_jumps
Cvars.help: Draws total jump count.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_last_frame
Cvars.help: Draws last saved frame value.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_last_session
Cvars.help: Draws value of latest completed session.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_pause_timer
Cvars.help: Draws current value of pause timer.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_player_info
Cvars.help: Draws player state defined with sar_tas_set_prop.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_portals
Cvars.help: Draws total portal count.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_position
Cvars.help:
Draws absolute position of the client.
0 = Default,
1 = Player position,
2 = Camera position.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_session
Cvars.help: Draws current session tick.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_steps
Cvars.help: Draws total step count.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_sum
Cvars.help: Draws summary value of sessions.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_text
Cvars.help: Draws specified text when not empty.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_timer
Cvars.help: Draws current value of timer.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_trace
Cvars.help:
Draws distance values of tracer. 0 = Default,
1 = Vec3,
2 = Vec2.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_velocity
Cvars.help:
Draws velocity of the client.
0 = Default,
1 = X/Y/Z,
2 = X/Y,
3 = X : Y : Z.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_velocity_angle
Cvars.help: Draws velocity angles.

Cvars.name: sar_hud_velocity_peak
Cvars.help: Draws last saved velocity peak.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud
Cvars.help:
Draws movement inputs of client.
0 = Default,
1 = forward;back;moveleft;moveright,
2 = 1 + duck;jump;use,
3 = 2 + attack;attack2,
4 = 3 + speed;reload.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_button_color
Cvars.help: RGBA button color of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_button_padding
Cvars.help: Padding between buttons of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_button_size
Cvars.help: Button size of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_font_color
Cvars.help: RGBA font color of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_font_index
Cvars.help: Font index of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_layout
Cvars.help:
Layout of input HUD.
Labels are in this order:
forward,
moveleft,
back,
moveright,
duck,
jump,
use,
attack,
attack2,
speed,
reload.
Pass an empty string to disable drawing labels completely.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_setlayout
Cvars.help: Suggests keyboard layouts for sar_ihud_layout.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_setpos
Cvars.help:
Sets automatically the position of input HUD.
Usage: sar_ihud_setpos <top, center or bottom> <left, center or right>

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_shadow
Cvars.help: Draws button shadows of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_shadow_color
Cvars.help: RGBA button shadow color of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_shadow_font_color
Cvars.help: RGBA button shadow font color of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_x
Cvars.help: X offset of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_ihud_y
Cvars.help: Y offset of input HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_inspection_export
Cvars.help:
Saves recorded entity data to a csv file.
Usage: sar_inspection_export <file_name>

Cvars.name: sar_inspection_index
Cvars.help: Sets entity index for inspection.

Cvars.name: sar_inspection_print
Cvars.help: Prints recorded entity data.

Cvars.name: sar_inspection_save_every_tick
Cvars.help: Saves inspection data even when session tick does not increment.

Cvars.name: sar_inspection_start
Cvars.help: Starts recording entity data.

Cvars.name: sar_inspection_stop
Cvars.help: Stops recording entity data.

Cvars.name: sar_jumpboost
Cvars.help:
Enables special game movement on the server.
0 = Default,
1 = Orange Box Engine,
2 = Pre-OBE.

Cvars.name: sar_list_client_classes
Cvars.help: Lists all client classes.

Cvars.name: sar_list_ents
Cvars.help: Lists entities.

Cvars.name: sar_list_server_classes
Cvars.help: Lists all server classes.

Cvars.name: sar_mimic
Cvars.help: Copies inputs to secondary split screen. Similar to ss_mimic.

Cvars.name: sar_pause
Cvars.help: Enable pause after a load.

Cvars.name: sar_pause_at
Cvars.help: Pause at the specified tick.

Cvars.name: sar_pause_for
Cvars.help: Pause for this amount of ticks.

Cvars.name: sar_record_at
Cvars.help: Start recording a demo at the tick specified. Will use sar_record_at_demo_name.

Cvars.name: sar_record_at_demo_name
Cvars.help: Name of the demo automatically recorded.

Cvars.name: sar_record_at_increment
Cvars.help: Increment automatically the demo name.

Cvars.name: sar_rename
Cvars.help: Changes your name. Usage: sar_rename <name>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_autoloop
Cvars.help: Plays replay again when it ended.

Cvars.name: sar_replay_clone_views
Cvars.help:
Clones view to another of a replay.
Usage: sar_replay_clone_views <replay_index> <view_index>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_export
Cvars.help:
Exports replay to a file.
Usage: sar_replay_export <file>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_export_at
Cvars.help:
Exports specific replay to a file.
Usage: sar_replay_export_at <index> <file>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_import
Cvars.help:
Imports replay file.
Usage: sar_replay_import <file>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_import_add
Cvars.help:
Imports replay file but doesn't delete already added replays.
Usage: sar_replay_import_add <file>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_list
Cvars.help: Lists all currently imported replays.

Cvars.name: sar_replay_merge_all
Cvars.help: Merges all replays into one.

Cvars.name: sar_replay_merge_views
Cvars.help:
Merges one view to another of two replays.
Usage: sar_replay_merge_views <replay_index1> <replay_index2> <view_index1> <view_index2>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_mode
Cvars.help:
Mode of replay system.
0 = Default,
1 = Automatic recording after a load,
2 = Automatic playback after a load.

Cvars.name: sar_replay_play
Cvars.help: Plays back a replay.

Cvars.name: sar_replay_play_view
Cvars.help:
Plays back a specific view of a replay.
Usage: sar_replay_play_view <view_index>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_record
Cvars.help: Starts recording a replay.

Cvars.name: sar_replay_record_view
Cvars.help:
Starts recording a specific view for a replay.
Usage: sar_replay_record_view <view_index>

Cvars.name: sar_replay_stop
Cvars.help: Stops recording or playing user inputs.

Cvars.name: sar_replay_viewmode
Cvars.help:
Fallback mode of replay system.
0 = Default,
1 = Automatically records first view and plays second view after a load,
2 = Automatically records second view and plays first view after a load.

Cvars.name: sar_save_flag
Cvars.help:
Echo message when using sar_bind_save.
Default is "#SAVE#", a SourceRuns standard.
Keep this empty if no echo message should be binded.

Cvars.name: sar_session
Cvars.help: Prints the current tick of the server since it has loaded.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_autostart
Cvars.help: Starts speedrun timer automatically on first frame after a load.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_autostop
Cvars.help: Stops speedrun timer automatically when going into the menu.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_category
Cvars.help: Sets the category for a speedrun.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_export
Cvars.help:
Saves speedrun result to a csv file.
Usage: sar_speedrun_export <file_name>

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_export_pb
Cvars.help:
Saves speedrun personal best to a csv file.
Usage: sar_speedrun_export_pb <file_name>

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_import
Cvars.help:
Imports speedrun data file.
Usage: sar_speedrun_import <file_name>

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_offset
Cvars.help: Sets offset in ticks at which the timer should start.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_pause
Cvars.help: Pauses speedrun timer manually.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_reset
Cvars.help: Resets speedrun timer.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_result
Cvars.help: Prints result of speedrun.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_resume
Cvars.help: Resumes speedrun timer manually.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_smartsplit
Cvars.help: Timer interface only splits once per level change.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_split
Cvars.help: Splits speedrun timer manually.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_standard
Cvars.help: Timer automatically starts, splits and stops.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_start
Cvars.help: Starts speedrun timer manually.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_stop
Cvars.help: Stops speedrun timer manually.

Cvars.name: sar_speedrun_time_pauses
Cvars.help: Timer automatically adds non-simulated ticks when server pauses.

Cvars.name: sar_sr_hud
Cvars.help: Draws speedrun timer.

Cvars.name: sar_sr_hud_font_color
Cvars.help: RGBA font color of speedrun timer HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_sr_hud_font_index
Cvars.help: Font index of speedrun timer HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_sr_hud_x
Cvars.help: X offset of speedrun timer HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_sr_hud_y
Cvars.help: Y offset of speedrun timer HUD.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_auto_reset
Cvars.help:
Resets all stats automatically.
0 = Default,
1 = Restart or disconnect only,
2 = Any load & sar_timer_start.
Note: Portal counter is not part of the "stats" feature.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_jump
Cvars.help: Prints jump stats.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_jumps_reset
Cvars.help: Resets total jump count and jump distance peak.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_jumps_xy
Cvars.help: Saves jump distance as 2D vector.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_reset
Cvars.help: Resets all saved stats.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_steps
Cvars.help: Prints total amount of steps.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_steps_reset
Cvars.help: Resets total step count.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_velocity
Cvars.help: Prints velocity stats.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_velocity_peak_xy
Cvars.help: Saves velocity peak as 2D vector.

Cvars.name: sar_stats_velocity_reset
Cvars.help: Resets velocity peak.

Cvars.name: sar_sum_during_session
Cvars.help: Updates the summary counter automatically during a session.

Cvars.name: sar_sum_here
Cvars.help: Starts counting total ticks of sessions.

Cvars.name: sar_sum_result
Cvars.help: Prints result of summary.

Cvars.name: sar_sum_stop
Cvars.help: Stops summary counter.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_addang
Cvars.help: sar_tas_addang <x> <y> [z] : Adds {x, y, z} degrees to {x, y, z} view axis.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_aim_at_point
Cvars.help:
sar_tas_aim_at_point <x> <y> <z> [speed] : Aims at point {x, y, z} specified.
Setting the [speed] parameter will make a time interpolation between current player angles and the targeted point.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_autostart
Cvars.help: Starts queued commands automatically on first frame after a load.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_delay
Cvars.help:
Delays command queue by specified amount of frames.
Usage: sar_tas_delay <frames_to_wait>

Cvars.name: sar_tas_frame_after
Cvars.help:
Adds command frame to the queue after waiting for specified amount of frames.
Usage: sar_tas_frame_after <frames_to_wait> [command_to_execute]

Cvars.name: sar_tas_frame_after_for
Cvars.help:
Adds two command frames to the queue after waiting for specified amount of frames, the last frame will be executed after a delay.
Usage: sar_tas_frame_after_for <frames_to_wait> <delay> <first_command> <last_command>

Cvars.name: sar_tas_frame_at
Cvars.help:
Adds command frame to the queue at specified frame.
Usage: sar_tas_frame_at <frame> [command_to_execute]

Cvars.name: sar_tas_frame_at_for
Cvars.help:
Adds two command frames to the queue at specified frame, the last frame will be executed after a delay.
Usage: sar_tas_frame_at_for <frame> <delay> <first_command> <last_command>

Cvars.name: sar_tas_frame_next
Cvars.help:
Adds command frame to the queue after waiting for specified amount of frames.
Usage: sar_tas_frame_next <frames_to_wait> [command_to_execute]

Cvars.name: sar_tas_frame_offset
Cvars.help:
sar_tas_frame_after rely on the last sar_tas_frame_offset.
Usage: sar_tas_frame_offset <frame>

Cvars.name: sar_tas_frames_after
Cvars.help:
Adds command frame multiple times to the queue after waiting for specified amount of frames.
Usage: sar_tas_frames_after <frames_to_wait> <interval> <length> [command_to_execute]

Cvars.name: sar_tas_frames_at
Cvars.help:
Adds command frame multiple times to the queue at specified frame.
Usage: sar_tas_frames_at <frame> <interval> <last_frame> [command_to_execute]

Cvars.name: sar_tas_reset
Cvars.help: Stops executing commands and clears them from the queue.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_set_prop
Cvars.help: sar_tas_set_prop <prop_name> : Sets value for sar_hud_player_info.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_setang
Cvars.help:
sar_tas_setang <x> <y> [z] [speed] : Sets {x, y, z} degrees to view axis.
Setting the [speed] parameter will make a time interpolation between current player angles and the targeted angles.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_ss
Cvars.help:
Select split screen index for command buffer (0 or 1).
Usage: sar_tas_ss <index>

Cvars.name: sar_tas_ss_forceuser
Cvars.help: Forces engine to calculate movement for every splitescreen client.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_start
Cvars.help: Starts executing queued commands.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_strafe
Cvars.help:
sar_tas_strafe <type> <direction> : Automatic strafing.
Type: 0 = off, 1 = straight, 2 = turning and keeping velocity, 3 = turning with velocity gain.
Direction: -1 = left, 1 = right.

Cvars.name: sar_tas_strafe_vectorial
Cvars.help:
sar_tas_strafe_vectorial <type>: Change type of vectorial strafing.
0 = Auto-strafer calculates perfect viewangle,
1 = Auto-strafer calculates perfect forward-side movement,
2 = Auto-strafer calculates perfect forward-side movement, while setting the viewangle toward current velocity, to make strafing visually visible.

Cvars.name: sar_teleport
Cvars.help: Teleports the player to the last saved location.

Cvars.name: sar_teleport_setpos
Cvars.help: Saves current location for teleportation.

Cvars.name: sar_time_demo
Cvars.help:
Parses a demo and prints some information about it.
Usage: sar_time_demo <demo_name>

Cvars.name: sar_time_demo_dev
Cvars.help:
Printing mode when using sar_time_demo.
0 = Default,
1 = Console commands,
2 = Console commands & packets.

Cvars.name: sar_time_demos
Cvars.help:
Parses multiple demos and prints the total sum of them.
Usage: sar_time_demos <demo_name> <demo_name2> <etc.>

Cvars.name: sar_timer_always_running
Cvars.help: Timer will save current value when disconnecting.

Cvars.name: sar_timer_result
Cvars.help: Prints result of timer.

Cvars.name: sar_timer_start
Cvars.help: Starts timer.

Cvars.name: sar_timer_stop
Cvars.help: Stops timer.

Cvars.name: sar_timer_time_pauses
Cvars.help: Timer adds non-simulated ticks when server pauses.

Cvars.name: sar_togglewait
Cvars.help: Enables or disables "wait" for the command buffer.

Cvars.name: sar_trace_a
Cvars.help: Saves location A for tracing.

Cvars.name: sar_trace_b
Cvars.help: Saves location B for tracing.

Cvars.name: sar_trace_reset
Cvars.help: Resets tracer.

Cvars.name: sar_trace_result
Cvars.help: Prints tracing result.

Cvars.name: sar_unbind_reload
Cvars.help: Unbinds current save-reload rebinder.

Cvars.name: sar_unbind_save
Cvars.help: Unbinds current save rebinder.

Cvars.name: sar_workshop
Cvars.help:
Same as "map" command but lists workshop maps.
Usage: sar_workshop <file> [ss/changelevel]

Cvars.name: sar_workshop_list
Cvars.help: Prints all workshop maps.

Cvars.name: sar_workshop_update
Cvars.help: Updates the workshop map list.
